issue.summary: LOC100329737 missing from new assembly
issue.status_text: I have written to RefSeq to enquire why LOC100329737 was removed from zv9. This ticket will be updated pending their response.
issue.description: The locus LOC100329737 is missing from Zv9

issue.summary: possible haplotypic duplication, CU469532 seems to be contained in neighbouring clone BX936450
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: CU469532 seems to be contained in neighbouring clone BX936450, leading to the duplication of the zgc:172341 and zbtb24 genes.
issue.resolution_text: TPF change has been made, BX936450 has been removed form the TPF and placed on the haplotype chromosome.

issue.summary: FQ323155.1 re-placement from chr17 to chr25
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: This clone is currently placed on chr 17 in the TPF and alignment evidence reveals movement of the clone to chr 25 instead.
issue.resolution_text: Evidence suggets that this clone should remain in its current position. This ticket will be resolved.

issue.summary: placement of ctgs: CABZ01047298.1 and CABZ01072228.1
issue.status_text: GAPMAP linkage group analysis suggests that the scaffolds containing the WGS reside on chr17. Scaffold Zv9_scaffold3548 containing CABZ01072228.1 linked by LG5174, see ticket ZG-4034 Scaffold Zv9_NA892 containing CABZ01047298.1 linked by LG5178.
issue.description: Genes CYP1C1 and CYP1C2 align to CABZ01047298.1 and CABZ01072228.1 - can these contigs be located onto a reference chromosome?

issue.summary: 3' end missing from gene meis2a - possible deletion in clone CU467629.3
issue.status_text: CU467629.3 removed from TPF to allow whole genome shotgun components to capture the missing portion of meis2a. CABZ01078347 and CABZ01078349 cover the gene.
issue.description: 3' end missing from gene meis2a - possible deletion in clone CU467629.3. Evidence from AF375872 970bp >

issue.summary: Haplotypic overlap between clones CR392364.6/FP928986.4 and CT583698.3/CU972452.10
issue.status_text: FP928986.4 has since been removed from the TPF. The resulting RBJ between CU972452.10 and CR392364.6 has had a certificate submitted for it, see ZG-6594.
issue.description: Haplotypic overlap between clones CR392364.6/FP928986.4 and CT583698.3/CU972452.10 on chr17. COnfirmed by cDNAs:BC115230.1 + BC122234.1 + BC124524.1 + BC142842.1 + BC058068.1

issue.summary: Haplotypic clone overlap between BX936463.13 and BX927104.11 and BX936408.10
issue.status_text: A certificate to confirm the haplotypic overlap between BX936463.13 and BX927104.11 has been submitted.
issue.description: Haplotypic clone overlap between BX936463.13 and BX927104.11 and BX936408.10. Confirmed by cDNAs BC085440.1 and BC056599.1

issue.summary: Chromosome 17 assembly path problem (CU861478.3 - CU928087.3)
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Assembly path problem between CU861478.3 (CH73-94I9) and CU928087.3 (CH1073-303L4).
issue.resolution_text: CU861478.3 and CU928087.3 share a 2kb overlap with 100% identity, there is no path problem between these components.

issue.summary: Accession in TPF needs to be changed for CH73-322I12
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: The accession in the TPF needs to be changed for CH73-322I12. Currently it is CU659418, but needs to be FO082301
issue.resolution_text: I have updated the TPF and changed the accession for CH73-322I12 from CU659418 to FO082301. Will upload the TPF to NCBI.

issue.summary: Possible Duplication of the qkia Gene in the Assembly
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Possible Duplication of the qkia Gene in the Assembly
issue.resolution_text: I have looked at the position of qkia in the latest version of the tile path it appears there is only one copy, since component BX936408.10, which it was previously annotated on, has been removed. This addresses the duplication enquiry that was raised.

issue.summary: Chromosome 17 assembly gap (CU694204.4 - CU628004.4)
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Assembly gap between CU694204.4 (CH73-252L9) and CU628004.4 (CU628004.4)

issue.status_text: none

issue.summary: Unlocalised component FO538758 maps to Chr17
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: GAPMAP linkage group 5163 localises this contig to chr17. Components to which it is anchored to are anchored to chr17 by markers from T51 map. Contig is in the vicinity of component BX511111
issue.resolution_text: This contig has been placed to chromosome 17 based on marker information.

issue.summary: WSTI Pac Bio reads mapped against GRCz10 suggest that GRCZ10_CTG1730 is adjacent to GRCZ10_CTG1728.
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: WSTI Pac Bio reads mapped against GRCz10 suggest that GRCZ10_CTG1730 is adjacent to GRCZ10_CTG1728.
issue.resolution_text: GRCZ10_CTG1730 (KN148960.1) is now adjacent to GRCZ10_CTG1728 (KN148963.1) based on evidence from PacBio long read data, Optical mapping information and Fosmid end pair alignments.
